languages.text: "Не только ты, шестеренка. В пору назначать праздник в честь смерти языкастого ублюдка! Удивительно поганый был тип даже для ксеноса".
"You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."
languages.original_text: "Не только ты, шестеренка. В пору назначать праздник в честь смерти языкастого ублюдка! Удивительно поганый был тип даже для ксеноса".

traits.locale_text: "You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."
"You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."
"You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."
"You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."

languages.text: “这么想的人并不只有你一个，齿轮人。我们应该把这一天当成纪念日，庆祝那个尖酸的孽种终于死了！即便是从异形的角度来看，他也是个相当邪恶的家伙。”
languages.original_text: "You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."

traits.locale_text: “这么想的人并不只有你一个，齿轮人。我们应该把这一天当成纪念日，庆祝那个尖酸的孽种终于死了！即便是从异形的角度来看，他也是个相当邪恶的家伙。”

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes pas le seul. On devrait d'ailleurs célébrer la mort de ce misérable en instaurant un jour férié ! Il faut dire que même pour un xénos, il était sacrément gratiné. »
languages.original_text: "You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes pas le seul. On devrait d'ailleurs célébrer la mort de ce misérable en instaurant un jour férié ! Il faut dire que même pour un xénos, il était sacrément gratiné. »

languages.text: «Lo mismo digo, engranaje. ¡Deberíamos establecer un día festivo en honor de la muerte de ese engendro despreciable! Era especialmente espantoso, incluso para un xenos».
languages.original_text: "You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Lo mismo digo, engranaje. ¡Deberíamos establecer un día festivo en honor de la muerte de ese engendro despreciable! Era especialmente espantoso, incluso para un xenos».

languages.text: 「アンタだけじゃないよ、歯車さん。あのとんがり舌の悪党が死んだ記念に、今日を祝日にすべきだよ！アイツは特に悪しき代表だったんだ、異種族ってことを考慮してもね」
languages.original_text: "You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタだけじゃないよ、歯車さん。あのとんがり舌の悪党が死んだ記念に、今日を祝日にすべきだよ！アイツは特に悪しき代表だったんだ、異種族ってことを考慮してもね」

languages.text: "Da seid Ihr nicht allein, Cog. Wir sollten diesen Tag zu einem Feiertag erklären, an dem wir den Tod dieses scharfzüngigen Wurms feiern! Er war ein besonders widerwärtiges Exemplar, selbst für einen Xenos."
languages.original_text: "You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Da seid Ihr nicht allein, Cog. Wir sollten diesen Tag zu einem Feiertag erklären, an dem wir den Tod dieses scharfzüngigen Wurms feiern! Er war ein besonders widerwärtiges Exemplar, selbst für einen Xenos."

languages.original_text: "You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."

languages.text: "Al benden de o kadar dişli. O sivri dilli pisliğin ölümünü kutlamak için bugünü tatil ilan edelim! Bir zeno için bile fazla iğrenç bir numuneydi ya."
languages.original_text: "You're not the only one, cog. We should make this day a holiday marking the death of that sharp-tongued wretch! He was a particularly foul specimen, even for a xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Al benden de o kadar dişli. Bugünü o sivri dilli pisliğin ölümünü kutlamak için tatil ilan edelim! Zenolar için bile fazla iğrenç bir numuneydi kendisi."
